Name: Doughball Descent
About the game: Smash through baguette brickwork and muenster masonry in Doughball Descent, a Roguelite Puzzle-Platformer where you descend the endless, procedurally generated layers of the ancient Food Zigguraut. Be careful not to bite off more than you can chew! Your Weight will dictate how many blocks you'll fall through before you can stop, simultaneously your Weight is your currency in Shops and Mystery Events; are you brave enough to embrace the blubber for greater risk and reward? Visit 5 delicious Worlds , each with a smörgåsbord of unique traps, enemies, and handcrafted vaults. Amass not only mass, but a collection of infinitely-stackable items that change and enhance your playstyle!
